channel.title: Spaceizers go
channel.description: i dont know what fuss is abaout but lets do this [code]process.stdout.write "hello"[_i] + " " for i in "hello"[/code] [code]>coffee hello.coffee h e l l o[/code]

item.title: Spaceizers go
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:24, topic:534863”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=653663.msg4379920#msg4379920 date=1383177875]
no i can’t remember if it was rictoo or someone else that wrote it but it was hilarious.
[/quote]
What about this

[code=java] public static void main(String[] args) {
System.out.println(multiply(“Derp”, 10));
}

public static String multiply(String s, int multiplicity) {
	String p = s.replaceAll(".", "$0$0");
	if (multiplicity > 1)
		return multiply(p, --multiplicity);
	else
		return p;
}[/code]

Increase file size exponentially[/quote]
no it was unintentional.

Read full topic

What about this

[code=java] public static void main(String[] args) {
System.out.println(multiply(“Derp”, 10));
}

public static String multiply(String s, int multiplicity) {
	String p = s.replaceAll(".", "$0$0");
	if (multiplicity > 1)
		return multiply(p, --multiplicity);
	else
		return p;
}[/code]

Increase file size exponentially

item.title: Spaceizers go
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

remember this vortex?!?!?

    public static String izer(String splitter, Object... args) {
        String s = "";
        for (int i = 0; i < args.length; i++) {
            if (args[i] instanceof Object[]) {
                Object[] arr = (Object[]) args[i];
                for (int j = 0; j < arr.length; j++) {
                    s += toString(arr[j]) + ((j == args.length - 1) ? "" : splitter);
                }
            } else {
                s += toString(args[i]) + ((i == args.length - 1) ? "" : splitter);
            }
        }
        return s;
    }

Read full topic

#!/bin/bash

function freedom() { i=0 ; while [ $i -lt ${#1} ] ; do echo -n "${1:$i:1} " ; i=$((i+1)) ; done ; echo ; }
freedom “When we speak of free software, we are referring to freedom, not price.”

item.title: Spaceizers go
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

re/no re

[code=lisp]#lang racket
(define (spacerizer s)
(string-join (map (lambda © (format "~a " c)) (string->list s)) “”))

(define (spacerizer-re s)
(string-trim (regexp-replace* #rx"" s " ")))

(let ((s “hue hue”))
(displayln (spacerizer s))
(displayln (spacerizer-re s)))[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Spaceizers go
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:7, topic:534863”][code=java]
public final class Spacerizer {

public static void main(String[] args) {
    System.out.println(spacerize("Harder challenge plz"));
}

private static String spacerize(String string) {
    return string.replaceAll(".(?=.)", "$0 ");
}

}[/code]

H a r d e r c h a l l e n g e p l z

edit: http://www.regular-expressions.info/lookaround.html a++[/quote][quote=“Davidi2, post:10, topic:534863”] private static String spacerize(String string) {return string.replaceAll(".(?=.)", "$0 ");}[/quote]repost rep–
